data.name: AllEmployeeNumbers
data.value: What is the total number of the organization staff? Please indicate the number of organization staff (full time/part-time/volunteers).

data.name: BoarderMemmbersMeetings
data.value: How often does board members meet during the year?

data.name: BoardMemmbersRoles
data.value: Does the Board of Directors have internal regulations indicating the processes of work, positions and roles of the Board and its committees?

data.name: BoardMemmbersRolesForOrganiziation
data.value: What is the role of the organization's board of directors?

data.name: BudgetOfCorprateCommunication
data.value: What is the budget allocated for corporate communication\PR from the total budget of the organization?

data.name: CommunicationPlan
data.value: Does the organization have corporate communication plan?

data.name: DoesTheOrganizationHaveAnAnnualOperatingPlan
data.value: Does the organization have an annual operational plan?

data.name: DoesTheOrganztionHaveAnStratgicObject
data.value: Does the organization have a strategic objective that seeks to empower or increase income or improve the socio-economic status of the organization's beneficiaries?

data.name: FollowUpAndEvaluationAttachment
data.value: Please attach the monitoring & evaluation forms that you use in your organization.

data.name: FollowUpAndEvaluationImplentation
data.value: Does the organization produce monitoring & evaluation reports that include corrective actions for the implemented projects?

data.name: FollowUpAndEvaluationProjectsAndPrograms
data.value: Does the organization have monitoring & evaluation plan for its programs and projects?

data.name: HaveRelationAndMedia
data.value: Does the organization have corporate communication/public relations department?

data.name: HowManyBoardMembers
data.value: How many board members you have in the organization?

data.name: HowManyEmployees
data.value: How many staff members at the organization?

data.name: HowStaffPerformanceIsMonitored
data.value: How do you monitor staff performane?

data.name: HowTheStratgicPlanDeveloped
data.value: How was your previous strategic plan developed, and who participated in developing it from the organization?

data.name: HowToAttractEmployees
data.value: How do you recruit new employees?

data.name: HROrganizationStructure
data.value: Is there an organizational structure which human resources management in the organization is acting upon?

data.name: HRSpecializedDepartment
data.value: Is there a Human Resources department at the organization?

data.name: IdentfiyTrainingNeeds
data.value: How do you identify the training needs of staff members?

data.name: IndicateDevelopmentProjects
data.value: Please indicate the development projects you are working on in the organization, giving an overview of each project.

data.name: IsThereIsSpecializeDepartmentForFinancialResources
data.value: Is there a fundraising department at the organization?

data.name: NumberOfDonors
data.value: Please specify the number of donors from each option selected and the amount of donation from each donor

data.name: NumberOfFinanceSupporter
data.value: How many corporates / individuals provided financial support to your organization last year

data.name: OrganizationEstablishedFor
data.value: What is the cause that you establish your organization for?

data.name: OrganizationGovernmentGuid
data.value: Does the organization have a governance manual?

data.name: organizationStratgicObjectvies
data.value: Does the organization plan its projects according to the strategic objectives?

data.name: organizationStratgicObjectviesAndImplements
data.value: Does the organization plan the implementation of its activities with the participation of the target groups and other stakeholders?

data.name: OrganzationBudget
data.value: What is the Organization's total budget this year?

data.value: Please attach the operational plan for this Year

data.value: What is the budget allocated for programs and projects?

data.value: What is the budget allocated for operations?

data.name: SeparateBudgetOfCorprateCommunication
data.value: Does the organization have a separate budget line for corporate communication/Puplic Relations?
